anya-e0703n0:9430: Diṭṭhe diṭṭhe pamocesi, dukkhamhā dukkhite jane.
anya-e0703n0:9433: Saddhiṃ gacchati senāya, devehi viya vāsavo.
anya-e0703n0:9435: Taṃ disvā sirisobhagga-maggaṃ pattaṃ mahī patiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9451: “Ruṭṭho kimatthaṃ bho tva”nti, pucchi sabbamavoca so.
anya-e0703n0:9454: Avamaññāya maṃ mayhaṃ, parato to yāti hatthinā.
anya-e0703n0:9457: Hatthaṃ me eti kāretvā, sabbaṃ dāsāna niggahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9459: No ce hatthaṃ mamā’yāti, māretvā galalohitaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9460: Pivissāmi na sandeho, na cireneva passasi”.
anya-e0703n0:9462: So gantvā narapālassa, pavattiṃ taṃ nivedayi;
anya-e0703n0:9471: Alabhanto sahāyaṃ me, nāsakkhi tassa ghātane;
anya-e0703n0:9474: Etha gehe vasitvā me, hotha me anuvattakā;
anya-e0703n0:9477: Iti vatvāna taṃ kuṭṭhaṃ, netvā so gharamattano;
anya-e0703n0:9490: Matoti sutvā tassā-si hadayaṃ phalitaṃ dvidhā.
anya-e0703n0:9528: Karonto tañca so rājā, mākhijjantu janā iti;
anya-e0703n0:9540: Ñatvā amacco taṃ netvā, uyyānaṃ jādayīgharaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9541: Evaṃ paṭicca attānaṃ, dukkhaṃ nākāsi pāṇinaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9547: Loke lokahitaṃ natthi, kataṃ kiñci mahesīnā.
anya-e0703n0:9562: Bhaṇantā ratanaṃ suttaṃ, siñcamānā jalaṃ tathā.
anya-e0703n0:9589: Katvā nivāpaṃ dāpesi, tadajjāpi ca vattati.
anya-e0703n0:9637: Vuttaṃ vuttaṃ viyākāsi, virodhampi ca dassayi.
anya-e0703n0:9651: Tattha ñāṇodayaṃ nāma, katvā makaraṇaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n0:9655: Taṃ disvā revato thero, idaṃ vacanamabruvi.
anya-e0703n0:9666: Taṃ tattha gantvā sutvā taṃ, māgadhānaṃ niruttiyā;
anya-e0703n0:9669: Evaṃ vutto pasanno so, nikkhamitvā tatoimaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9679: Potthake detha sabbe”ti, āha vīmaṃsituṃ sataṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9682: Ettha dassehi taṃ disvā, sabbe demā”ti potthake.
anya-e0703n0:9722: Evaṃ sabbe nidhanavasagā honti sattā’ti niccaṃ,
anya-e0703n0:9723: Rāgaṃ sammā vinayatudhane jīvite cāpi dhīmā.
anya-e0703n0:9734: Tasmiṃyeva dine bheriṃ, carāpetvā tadā tu sā.
anya-e0703n0:9739: Atha macco mahāpañño, sahāyo tassa taṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9742: Rajjayoggoti cintetvā, katvā taṃ bhūpatiṃ raho;
anya-e0703n0:9745: Yasaṃ rajjaṃ vicāresi, chaṇe patte mahājanā;
anya-e0703n0:9746: Rājā ce atthi amhehi, saddhiṃ metūti ghosayuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9752: Rañño āṇāti vutte so, agā āruyha taṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9758: Mittaseno bahuṃ puññaṃ, katvā vassena so cuto.
anya-e0703n0:9770: Dhātusenavhayo āsi, dāṭhānāmo ca taṃ suto.
anya-e0703n0:9772: Gāme ambilayāgumhi, vasaṃ putte duve labhi;
anya-e0703n0:9775: Mātuso dariyo tesaṃ, saddho pabbajja vattati;
anya-e0703n0:9784: Sīse ākiri saṅkāraṃ, tassa ruṭṭho paroyati;
anya-e0703n0:9785: Tasmiṃ cittaṃ na dūsesi, tampi disvāna mātulo.
anya-e0703n0:9787: Uttamo vata’yaṃ satto, rājā hessati nicchayaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9791: Sikkhāpesi kumāraṃ taṃ, paṇḍuko taṃ vijāniya.
anya-e0703n0:9797: Pariveṇe na passiṃsu, tato nikkhamma te ubho.
anya-e0703n0:9802: Yathā nadiyaṃ vāreti, amhe taṃ tvampi vāraya;
anya-e0703n0:9803: Vāpiṃgahetvā etthe’ti, vatvā thero tadā nadiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9806: Nāgarājā tadā eko, piṭṭhiṃ pādāsi tena so.
anya-e0703n0:9809: Laddhā khīrodanaṃ sutvā, sesaṃ pattena tassa’dā.
anya-e0703n0:9812: Bhuñji theropi taṃ jāni, bhuñja te yaṃ mahiṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:9815: Cuto putto pipārindo, tatiyo tassa bhātuko.
anya-e0703n0:9826: Hate tasmiṃ mahīpāle, dāṭhiyo damiḷo tato;
anya-e0703n0:9838: Sodhetvā mediniṃ sādhu, katvā ca sukhitaṃjanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:9842: Te maṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā no, rakkhiṃsū’ti pakuppiya.
anya-e0703n0:9871: Maṃ gano thūpaviṭṭhi ca, dhātusenopi uttare;
anya-e0703n0:9872: Pācina kambaviṭṭhi ca, tathā antarame giri.
anya-e0703n0:9881: Vāpīyo ca tathākatvā, tesameva tu dāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:9932: Samantā yojane tassa, tadā rakkhañca yojayi.
anya-e0703n0:9956: Yācito tehi tesaṃ’va, adāsi dharaṇī pati.
anya-e0703n0:9961: Anto bahi ca kāretvā, nagarassa jinālaye;
anya-e0703n0:9964: Tassa puññāni sabbāni, vatthu paṭipadaṃ naro;
anya-e0703n0:9965: Ko hi nāma samatthoti, mukhamattaṃ nidassitaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:9970: Tathā pāṇasamā ekā, duhitā ca manoramā;
anya-e0703n0:9976: Ñatvā taṃ mātaraṃ tassa, naggaṃ jhapesi kujjhiya;
anya-e0703n0:9996: Ne’ti gutte na jānāsi, cittametassa bhūmipa;
anya-e0703n0:9999: Sutvā taṃ kupito dūte, pāhesī pitusantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10003: Tuṇhī ahosi te gantvā, rājakassa nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10008: Parissāmīti cintetvā, āha dūte sace mamaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10012: Pesesi dūte datvāna, rathaṃ jiṇṇena vājinā.
anya-e0703n0:10014: Evaṃ gacchati bhūpāle, pājento rathiko rathaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10015: Khādanto lājamassāpi, kiñci mattaṃ adāsi so.
anya-e0703n0:10017: Taṃ khāditvā pasīditvā, tasmiṃ pāṇamadā tadā;
anya-e0703n0:10021: Tasmā tāsu pamajjeyya, ko hi nāma sacetano.
anya-e0703n0:10023: Rājā etītisutvāna, thero so tassa soha do;
anya-e0703n0:10024: Laddhā māsodanaṃ maṃsaṃ, sāṇuṇañca varaṃ saraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10029: Evaṃ nisinnā sampatta-rajjā viya ubhopi te;
anya-e0703n0:10035: Tato vāpī mupagamma, oggayhitvā yathā sukhaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10038: Ettakaṃ me dhanaṃ bho’ti, sutvā taṃ rājasevakā;
anya-e0703n0:10041: Dhanaṃ rakkhati puttassa, dīpe bhindati mānuse;
anya-e0703n0:10044: Mārehi pitaraṃ meti, diṭṭhā piṭṭhīti verino;
anya-e0703n0:10048: Rājādisvā ca cintesi, pāpiyo’yaṃ mataṃ mama.
anya-e0703n0:10050: Kāyaṃ viya dukkhāpetvā, narakaṃ hetu micchati;
anya-e0703n0:10053: Iti mettāyamāno taṃ, āha senāpatiṃ pati;
anya-e0703n0:10063: Ko hi rajjeyya bhogesu, jīvitepi yasepi vā.
anya-e0703n0:10065: Dhātuseno narindo so, evaṃ puttahato gato;
anya-e0703n0:10091: Tattha nisseṇi gehāni, tena taṃ nāmako ahū.
anya-e0703n0:10094: Attano nihitānaṃ so, rakkhaṃ datvā tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10106: Muccissāmi kataṃ nu’ti, puññaṃ kāsi anappakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10108: Mahā vatthuni kāresi, dvāresu nagarassa so;
anya-e0703n0:10109: Ambuyyāne ca kāresi, dīpe yojana yojane.
anya-e0703n0:10112: Adhikaṃ bhogagāme ca, adhikaṃ tassa dāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:10114: Bodhi uppalavaṇṇā ca, tassāsuṃ dhītaro duve;
anya-e0703n0:10117: Dente tasmiṃ na icchiṃsu, samaṇā theravādino;
anya-e0703n0:10121: Bhikkhave adhivāsesuṃ, bhogo no satthuno iti.
anya-e0703n0:10123: Kathā niyyanti uyyāne, samīpe pabbatassa so;
anya-e0703n0:10124: Kārāpesi vihāraṃ so, tesaṃ nāmo tato ahu.
anya-e0703n0:10136: Samādiyi dhutaṅge ca, likhāpesi ca potthake.
anya-e0703n0:10139: Bhito so paralokamhā, moggallānā ca vattati.
anya-e0703n0:10147: Rājā sutvā gahetvā taṃ, bhañjissāmiti nikkhami;
anya-e0703n0:10159: Disvā taṃ sāmikono’yaṃ, palāyati bhaṇe iti;
anya-e0703n0:10165: Katvā’ḷāhana kiccaṃ so, tassa kamme pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n0:10168: Bhikkhū sutvā pavattiṃ taṃ, sunivatthā supārutā;
anya-e0703n0:10175: Chattattena saṅghaṃ pūjesi, saṅgho tasseva taṃ adā.
anya-e0703n0:10177: Taṃ ṭhānaṃ chattavaḍḍhīti, vohariṃsu tahiṃ kataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10183: Kuddho nīhari dāṭhaṃso, ghātakaṃ pituno mama;
anya-e0703n0:10184: Anuvattitvā maccāti, tena rakkhasa nāma vā.
anya-e0703n0:10193: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ dānaṃ, dīpe ajjāpi vattati.
anya-e0703n0:10198: Taṃ disvā paridevitvā, pituno pema mattanī;
anya-e0703n0:10227: Ammaṃ saṅghassa pādāsi, saṅgho tasmiṃ pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n0:10228: Āha’mba sāmaṇero’ti, tena taṃ nāmako ahu.
anya-e0703n0:10233: Tassa katvāna sakkāraṃ, gahetvā kesa dhātuyo;
anya-e0703n0:10240: Ṭhapesi paṭimāyo ca, assa bimbañca cārukaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10258: Katvā’ṭṭhārasame vasse, so puññāni khayaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:10261: Jetuṃ no visahittha maccumupagaṃ so yevadāsoviya;
anya-e0703n0:10262: Tasmā maccubalaṃ nihacca sukhino hessanti medhāvino;
anya-e0703n0:10271: Ahu tassa suto rājā, devarūpo mahābalo.
anya-e0703n0:10279: Tittiseno suto tassa, rājā hutvā anekadhā;
anya-e0703n0:10280: Katvā puññāni rajjaṃ taṃ, māsampi navame jahi.
anya-e0703n0:10282: Sivo taṃ mātulo hantvā, hutvā rājā anappakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10285: Upatisso tato āsi, rājā hantvāna sīvakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10291: Eko putto ahu rañño, upatissassa kassapo;
anya-e0703n0:10298: Dakkhiṇaṃ malayaṃ gantvā, saṅgaṇhitvā mahā balaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10301: Taṃ sutvā kassapo jeṭṭho, varamāruyha kuñjaraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10307: Hatthe katvā upāyena, dese pācina pacchime.
anya-e0703n0:10319: Yujjhitvā viralā āsuṃ, tato cintesi kassapo.
anya-e0703n0:10322: Parihīnaṃ balaṃ rājā, andhako ca mahallako.
anya-e0703n0:10325: Aṅgahetvā balaṃ pacchā, coro niggaṇhi yo iti.
anya-e0703n0:10333: Silākāḷo pavattiṃ taṃ, sutvā saṅgamma vegasā;
anya-e0703n0:10340: Puñchitvā lohitaṃ katvā, kosiyaṃ asi puttikaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10354: Anvahaṃ pūjayi bodhiṃ, paṭimāyo ca kārayi;
anya-e0703n0:10370: Gantvā tattha vasāhīti, sopi gantvā tahiṃ vasi.
anya-e0703n0:10378: Tassa dvādasame vasse, ito kāsi puraṃ gato;
anya-e0703n0:10387: Ṭhapetvā anuvassaṃ tu, netvā jetavanaṃ mahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10388: Kātuṃ kāresi cārittaṃ, hitaṃ mantvāna pāṇinaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10405: Sāparādhāna te me vā, manussā dīpavāsino;
anya-e0703n0:10408: Tasmā aññena yujjhantu, ubhoyeva mayaṃ idha;
anya-e0703n0:10412: Āruyha munino māro viya otthari tāvade.
anya-e0703n0:10423: Rājā ārabhi taṃ disvā, chindituṃ sīsamattano;
anya-e0703n0:10427: Chaḍḍesi chahi so rajjaṃ, māsehi divasehi ca.
anya-e0703n0:10429: Moggallāno tato rājā, āsi dīpe mahābalo;
anya-e0703n0:10457: Datvā bhutvā yathākāmaṃ, vasse vīsatime mari.
anya-e0703n0:10468: Mahesī sā sadā āsi, padhānā sabbakammasu;
anya-e0703n0:10472: Dubbale ca viheṭhesuṃ, balī jānapadā narā.
anya-e0703n0:10489: Bījaṃ bhaginī māyāci, bījagāhañca tassa sā;
anya-e0703n0:10495: Taṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā so, aladdhā kiñci bhojanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10502: Datvā āhari āhāraṃ, so taṃ bhutvā pasīdiya.
anya-e0703n0:10511: So bhīto purime yāme, āgataṃ taṃ na sambhusī.
anya-e0703n0:10514: Gahetvā khipi tīheva, aṅgulīhi sataṃ chupi.
anya-e0703n0:10516: So taṃ byākāsi taṃ ditvā, sabalaṃ me parissamaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10517: Tīhi rājūhi yujjhitvā, catutthaṃ tvaṃ nighātiya.
anya-e0703n0:10519: Vuḍḍho tīṇeva vassāni, rājā hutvā na jīvasi;
anya-e0703n0:10520: Tathā hessanti rājāno, tayo te vaṃsajā narā.
anya-e0703n0:10522: Gantvā sevassu rājānaṃ, pacchā passasi mekhalaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10523: Iti vatvāna pesesi, sopi gantvā narissaraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10526: Taṃ akāsi taduṭṭhānaṃ, bhaṇḍamāhari so bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10529: Datvā ṭhānantaraṃ tassa, gantuṃ tattheva yojayi.
anya-e0703n0:10532: Ādāya gantvā taṃ desaṃ, parivattesi sabbaso.
anya-e0703n0:10534: Paccekabhogaṃ katvāna, rohaṇaṃ tattha so vasaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10540: Rajjaṃ gahetuṃ kāloti, sīghaṃ āgamma rohaṇā;
anya-e0703n0:10543: Sayaṃ hutvā mahīpālo, desaṃ katvā yathā pure;
anya-e0703n0:10579: Sappañño taṃ saranto bhavatu bhavasukhaṃ vantukāmo hitesī.
anya-e0703n0:10640: Keḷivāte ca kāresi, sumanaṃ nāma pabbataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10646: Gāmaṃ datvā niyojesi, ārakkhaṃ dhītu nāmakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10649: Dāṭhā sivassa ṭhatvāna, ovāde sādhu bhikkhuno;
anya-e0703n0:10659: Bhikkhūnaṃ catusaṭṭhīnaṃ, vihāraṃ taṃ tadā adā.
anya-e0703n0:10676: Chattaṃ soṇṇañca kāresi, nikāyesupi tīsu so;
anya-e0703n0:10680: Tattha tattha ca pūjesi, mahagghaṃ ratanuttamaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10692: Hatthamukkhippi taṃ hantuṃ, gaṇḍo sañjāyi taṃkhaṇe.
anya-e0703n0:10698: Rakkhituṃ taṃ niyojesi, theraṃ sopi tamācari.
anya-e0703n0:10701: Katvevaṃ bahudhā puññaṃ, catuttiṃse same mato.
anya-e0703n0:10703: Aggabodhi tato āsi, rājā pubbassa rājino;
anya-e0703n0:10719: Jotipālamhi pabbaji, rājā sakkāsi taṃ ciraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10737: Vandamāne pabhijjitvā, bhāgo taṃ purato pati.
anya-e0703n0:10740: Rājā disvāva saṃviggo, kammaṃ paṭṭhapi taṃkhaṇe.
anya-e0703n0:10748: Sace rājā papañceti, kātuṃ dhātugharaṃ mayaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10751: Rājā pabuddho saṃviggo, na cireneva kārayi;
anya-e0703n0:10754: Catasso paṭimāyo ca, pallaṅke ca silāmaye;
anya-e0703n0:10775: Nāmaṃ katvāna so’kāsi, attano ca mahesiyā;
anya-e0703n0:10788: Evaṃ puññāni katvā so, divaṃ’gā dasame same.
anya-e0703n0:10791: Maccusseva vasaṃ tatohi matimā sammā bhavassīdisaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10792: Passanto niyamaṃ vihāya vidhinā sabbaṃ bhave saṅgatiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10801: Sāsanassa ca raṭṭhassa, vuddhikāmo naye rato.
anya-e0703n0:10813: Balaṃ so sannipātento, vāsaṃ tattheva kappayi.
anya-e0703n0:10822: Yena kenaci lesena, sayaṃ dukkhiva dummano.
anya-e0703n0:10824: Āturo viya bāḷhaṃ so, hosi mañcaparāyano;
anya-e0703n0:10828: Handa tvaṃ nagaraṃ rakkha, nate sakkā mayā saha.
anya-e0703n0:10834: Rājā dvisvā’ti nibinno, yāva mando na hessati.
anya-e0703n0:10843: Putto disvā narindassa, ghātessāmi imaṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:10845: Āha rājā nivāresi, mā te rucci balaṃ idaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10854: Corassa senā taṃ ditvā, haritvā sāmino adā;
anya-e0703n0:10858: Gantvā taṃ parivāresi, rājā āsi tadekako.
anya-e0703n0:10866: Upāgamma puraṃ rājā, āsī laṅkā talādhipo;
anya-e0703n0:10867: Tato cintesi jīvante, sattumhi na sukhaṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:10869: So sutvā pubbarājassa, putto etthāti kujjhiya;
anya-e0703n0:10872: Upakkami tadā raññā, āṇatto puriso khaṇe;
anya-e0703n0:10873: Chindituṃ hatthapādaṃ so, kumāro rodi dummano.
anya-e0703n0:10875: Pūvakhādakahatthaṃ me, chindeyyaṃ ce tadā ahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10876: Khādisaṃ tena pūveti, haṃ sutvā rājakammiko.
anya-e0703n0:10879: Vāmaṃ hatthañca pādañca, tassa chindi narādhamo.
anya-e0703n0:10891: Sāsanaṃ tassa pesesuṃ, rājā sutvā visesato.
anya-e0703n0:10896: Sīsaṃ gaṇhatha tattheva, rañño ca tanayassa ca;
anya-e0703n0:10903: Sīsaṃ me paṭhamaṃ chetvā, detha mayhaṃ sukhaṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:10909: Tattha laggā kathaṃ niccaṃ, sukhaṃ bho na gavesatha.
anya-e0703n0:10914: Chinnasīso mayā diṭṭho, mayi jīvati sāmiko;
anya-e0703n0:10915: Ṭhapetvā hampi sevāmi, aho aññañhi sāmikaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:10917: Idha taṃ mārayitvāna, chāyaṃ tassa harissatha;
anya-e0703n0:10918: Aho aññāṇakā tumhe, maññe ummattakā iti.
anya-e0703n0:10920: Iti vatvāna so pāde, gahetvā sāmino sayi;
anya-e0703n0:10921: Tassa te haraṇopāyaṃ, apassantā yathā tathā.
anya-e0703n0:10923: Tassāpi sīsaṃ chetvāna, maccā ādāya tīṇi’pi;
anya-e0703n0:10951: Vihāraṃ naṃ bahunnaṃ so, bhogagāme bahū adā.
anya-e0703n0:10960: Taṃ sutvā so asiggāho, saputto rohaṇaṃgato.
anya-e0703n0:10962: Vasanto tattha so katvā, hatthe janapadaṃ lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:10972: Upaddutā matā āsuṃ, taṃ sutvā so asiggaho.
anya-e0703n0:10981: Sāsanaṃ tassa pesesi, ehi rājā bhavāhīti.
anya-e0703n0:10983: So taññatvā palāyitvā, nivatto malayaṃ agā;
anya-e0703n0:10984: Kathañhi laddhaṃ kicchena, rajjaṃso deti me iti.
anya-e0703n0:10986: Evaṃ kho dallanāmaṃ so, moggallānaṃ narissaraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11010: Gantvāna paratīraṃ so, ādāya damiḷe bahū;
anya-e0703n0:11013: Rājāpi sutvā taṃ gantvā, yujjhitvā rājamittake;
anya-e0703n0:11014: Gāme hantvāna taṃ tena, damiḷe saddhimāgate.
anya-e0703n0:11017: Adāsi dāse katvāna, vihāresu tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11020: Sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ visodhetvā, vasante akuto bhaye.
anya-e0703n0:11023: Dussīle bahule disvā, pabbajjāya navopi so.
anya-e0703n0:11026: Rājā te neva kāresi, dhammakammaṃ vihārake.
anya-e0703n0:11028: Dussīlā nihaṭā tena, sabbe mantiya ekato;
anya-e0703n0:11029: Raho taṃ mārayitvāna, taṃ kammaṃ paṭibāhayyuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11031: Rājā sutvā tadā kuddho, sabbegaṇhiya ekato;
anya-e0703n0:11034: Aññe tattha sataṃ bhikkhū, jambudīpe khipāpayi;
anya-e0703n0:11037: Bhikkhū theriyavāde so, kātuṃ tehi uposathaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11040: Akkositvā ca bhāsitvā, vācāhi pharusāhi so;
anya-e0703n0:11043: Tassa so mahatā phuṭṭho, rogena marisajjukaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11046: Tassa putto tato agga-bodhi nāmo kumārako;
anya-e0703n0:11052: Rājā so pubbarājūnaṃ, pavattaṃ na vināsiya;
anya-e0703n0:11055: Jeṭṭhatisso’tha taṃ sabbaṃ, suṇitvā malaye ṭhito;
anya-e0703n0:11065: Sabalaṃ pacchimaṃ desaṃ, so gantvā taṃ palāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:11082: Jeṭṭhatisso tato hutvā, pure rājāyathā pure;
anya-e0703n0:11107: Tattha tattha nilīnā te, desaṃ hantumupakkamuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11112: Paratīraṃ gato rājā, gahetvā damiḷaṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11134: Chetvā hatthimhi appetvā, churikaṃ kosiyaṃ khipi.
anya-e0703n0:11146: Khipitvā churikaṃ āha, evaṃ devo mato iti.
anya-e0703n0:11148: Sā taṃ disvā-tisokena, phāletvā hadayaṃ matā;
anya-e0703n0:11149: Evaṃ pañcahi māsehi, rājā so tidivaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:11152: Rajjaṃ pākatikaṃ katvā, viharanto pure vare.
anya-e0703n0:11172: Māṇassa maraṇaṃ sutvā, gahetvā damiḷe lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11179: Ekāvaliṃ gahetvāva, ekākī so hi nikkhami.
anya-e0703n0:11191: Gaṇhī tīsu nikāyesu, sāraṃ dhātugharesu ca.
anya-e0703n0:11221: Nāsakkhi kira vāretuṃ, aho pāpā nivāriyā.
anya-e0703n0:11229: Tatra ṭhito soḷasame, vasse byādhihato mato;
anya-e0703n0:11230: Tadā tassa kaṇiṭṭho so, yuvarājāpi kassapo.
anya-e0703n0:11287: Tassāsuṃ bahavo puttā, jeṭṭho tesañca māṇako;
anya-e0703n0:11290: Tato so byādhinā phuṭṭho, atekicchena kenaci;
anya-e0703n0:11291: Puttā me bālakā sabbe, ne’te rajjakkhamā iti.
anya-e0703n0:11294: Āhuya sabbaṃ pādāsi, rajjaṃ puttehi attano.
anya-e0703n0:11305: Ekato damiḷā hutvā, nibbāsema imaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n0:11306: Tasmiṃ ṭhite bahiddhāva, aggahesuṃ puraṃ sayaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11312: Pitā sutvāna taṃ āgā, na cīreneva rohaṇā.
anya-e0703n0:11315: Umiḷehi tato jātā, sabbe te samavuttino.
anya-e0703n0:11317: Tato so pitaraṃ rajje, abhisiñcittha māṇako;
anya-e0703n0:11324: Khaṇenā’gā imaṃ dīpaṃ, gahetvā damiḷhaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11326: Tadā te damiḷā sabbe, paribhūtā idha ṭhitā;
anya-e0703n0:11329: Māṇopi sutvā taṃ sabbaṃ, nāyaṃ kāloti yujjhituṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11332: Pubbadesaṃ sayaṃ gantvā, saṅgaṇhanto janaṃ vasī;
anya-e0703n0:11333: Laddhā damiḷapakkhaṃ so, gahetvā rājakaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11336: Mātulaṃ viya taṃ loko, tena nāmena vohari.
anya-e0703n0:11360: Theriyā te kibāhetvā, balaṃ tatheva kārayi.
anya-e0703n0:11362: Atha te te theriyā bhikkhū, dummaññū tattha rājini;
anya-e0703n0:11365: Vuttañhi muninā tena, assaddho yo upāsako;
anya-e0703n0:11366: Alābhāya ca bhikkhūnaṃ, ceteta’kkosati ca te.
anya-e0703n0:11368: Pattanikujjanaṃ tassa, kattabbanti tato hi te;
anya-e0703n0:11369: Tassa taṃ kammamakaruṃ, loko maññittha aññathā.
anya-e0703n0:11374: Tasmiṃ so samaye phuṭṭho, byādhinā mahatāmari;
anya-e0703n0:11377: Dappulopi tato rājā, gato rohaṇakaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11392: Ekāva dhītā tassāsi, rājanamagamā ca sā;
anya-e0703n0:11408: Sayaṃ vaccakuṭī esa, tattha sodhesi buddhimā.
anya-e0703n0:11416: Isseraṃ tattha vattesi, sampamaddiya satta vo;
anya-e0703n0:11419: Tassa tuṭṭho jano āha, mahāsāmīti esano;
anya-e0703n0:11423: Tassa pādāsi santuṭṭho, guṇehi bahukehi ca.
anya-e0703n0:11429: Dhammaṃ sutvā pasīditvā, tasmiṃ taṃ bahumānituṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11431: Vihāraṃ rohaṇe katvā, tassa pādāsi sopi taṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11459: Akāsi ca sayaṃ sādhu, parivārehī kārayi.
anya-e0703n0:11462: Vihārā nekakā āsuṃ, katā tehi sappaccayā.
anya-e0703n0:11464: Kadāci maggaṃ gacchaṃ so, araññamhi agāmake;
anya-e0703n0:11470: Alabhanto tadā niddaṃ, kinnu kho iti kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11473: Adisvā kāraṇaṃ anto, avassaṃ bahi hessati;
anya-e0703n0:11476: Evamāha ca nissaṅkaṃ, ayyakā mama rattiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11477: Tementā rukkhamūlasmiṃ, ṭhitā ānetha te iti.
anya-e0703n0:11482: Te gantvā sāsanaṃ rañño, ārocesuṃ padhāviso;
anya-e0703n0:11483: Disvā ca bhikkhu santuṭṭho, netvā vāsagharaṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11489: Nisīdāpiya te sabbe, sayane sādhu santhate.
anya-e0703n0:11501: Katvāna pituno senaṃ, dhanaṃ cevā harāpiya.
anya-e0703n0:11507: Yodhā dāṭho patissassa, māṇaṃ saṅgaṃva mārayuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11509: Taṃ sutvā dappulo sopi, sokasallahato mari;
anya-e0703n0:11513: Tasmā tassa kathā āsi, rohaṇamhi idhāpi ca.
anya-e0703n0:11537: Yattha katthaci disvāpi, bhikkhavo so mahāmati;
anya-e0703n0:11550: Bhogagāme ca dāpesi, tattha tattha bahūdaye.
anya-e0703n0:11564: Ete aññe ca so datvā, bhogagāme narissaro;
anya-e0703n0:11565: Dāsi ārāmike ceva, attano kira ñātake.
anya-e0703n0:11568: Disvāpi ca sutvā vā, bhogagāme bahū adā.
anya-e0703n0:11573: Anussaranto so tiṇṇaṃ, ratanānaṃ guṇe vare;
anya-e0703n0:11583: Gāmaṃ niṭṭhilaveṭṭhiñca, tassā’dā so sadā sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11598: Bhassa rañño’ nuvattantā, evaṃ dhammīhi pāṇino.
anya-e0703n0:11617: Dīpe maṇḍalikā sabbe, tattha tattha yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11638: Rājā bhaṇḍañca taṃ sabbaṃ, sabbañca balavāhanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11641: Evaṃ soḷasame vasse, rājā āsi divaṅgato;
anya-e0703n0:11647: Vinā raññā na sakkāti, mediniṃ paribhuñjituṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11651: Tassa nāmaṃ ṭhapetvāna, sayaṃ sabbaṃ vicārayi.
anya-e0703n0:11660: Tampi rajje bhisiñcitvā, yathā pubbaṃ sayaṃvasī.
anya-e0703n0:11674: Rañño tassaccaye rājā, māṇavammo ahosi so;
anya-e0703n0:11675: Kiṃ gotto kassa putto ca, kathaṃ rajjamapāpuṇi.
anya-e0703n0:11681: Taṃ labhitvā vasaṃ dese, uttare līnavuttiko.
anya-e0703n0:11686: Gantvā vatvā sakaṃ nāmaṃ, sevituṃ tamupakkami;
anya-e0703n0:11704: So taṃ gahetvā cintesi, sakhaṃ pesa narādhipo;
anya-e0703n0:11705: Ucchiṭṭhaṃ nāma kiṃ hoti, sattānaṃ paramatthato.
anya-e0703n0:11707: Tasmā yuttaṃ mayāpātu-mīti cintiya taṃ pivi;
anya-e0703n0:11710: Rājāpi disvā taṃ bhīto, tassapī tāva sesakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11711: Sayaṃ pivi tathāhoti, kammaṃ puññavataṃ sadā.
anya-e0703n0:11714: Bhojane sayane ceva, parihāre ca vāhane.
anya-e0703n0:11719: Ayaṃ kho mama sevāya, rajjaṃ vaṃsa gataṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11722: Sace sopi mayā gantvā, yujjhanto maraṇaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n0:11723: Takkitaṃ tassa mayhañca, sabbaṃ tamaphalaṃ bhave.
anya-e0703n0:11725: Evaṃ cintiyataṃ rājā, nivattetvā sake pure;
anya-e0703n0:11729: Rājā mīyati yuddhamhi, kiṃ phalaṃ mama jīvite.
anya-e0703n0:11734: Tasmā yuttaṃ mayā gantuṃ, sahasaṅgāma maṇḍalaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11735: Sukhañhi saddhiṃ tenettha, jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃpi vā.
anya-e0703n0:11738: Gantvā dassesi attānaṃ, so taṃ saṅgāma maṇḍale.
anya-e0703n0:11741: Saho santhavametasmiṃ, kattabbaṃ me kataṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:11743: Tato mānassa senā ca, senā cevassarājino;
anya-e0703n0:11750: Āliṅgatvā sinehena, tvaṃ kho me jayado iti.
anya-e0703n0:11755: Athevaṃ cintayi rājā, kattabbaṃ me sahāyako;
anya-e0703n0:11764: Mayāpi tassa kattabbaṃ, kammaṃ sādhu sukhāvahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11767: Evaṃ vutte amaccā te, paccāhaṃsu mahīpati;
anya-e0703n0:11768: Yaṃ yamicchati devohi, taṃ taṃ ruccati no iti.
anya-e0703n0:11770: Atha so māṇavammassa, senaṃ datvā savāhanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11785: Tadā sā damiḷi senā, assosi kira sāmiko;
anya-e0703n0:11791: Māṇavammo ca cintesi, sabbā senā gatā mama;
anya-e0703n0:11792: Mate mayi samijjheyya, verino me manorathaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11795: Puna rajjaṃ gahessaṃti, tasmā evamakāsi so.
anya-e0703n0:11803: Rajjatthaṃ me sahā yo maṃ, sevantoyeva addhago;
anya-e0703n0:11804: Vuddho hessati taṃ passaṃ, kathaṃ rajjaṃ karomahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11806: Imasmiṃ pana vārasmiṃ, pesayitvā balaṃ mama;
anya-e0703n0:11807: Rajjaṃ taṃ na gahessāmi, ko attho jīvitena me.
anya-e0703n0:11809: Evaṃ cintiya so senaṃ, sannipātiya attano;
anya-e0703n0:11816: Nāvaṃ ārohituṃ sabbe, na icchiṃsu tadā janā.
anya-e0703n0:11818: Tadā sīho vicintetvā, sayaṃ hutvā tirohito;
anya-e0703n0:11822: Āropetvāna taṃ nāvaṃ, gaccha ṭhatvāna sāgare.
anya-e0703n0:11825: So’pi sabbaṃ tathākāsi, rājāno agamā iti.
anya-e0703n0:11827: Āruhiṃsu janā nāvaṃ, ekaṃ katvā narādhipaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11828: So taṃ senaṅgamādāya, māṇo gantuṃ samārabhi.
anya-e0703n0:11831: Atha so paṭṭanaṃ patvā, otaritvā savāhano.
anya-e0703n0:11833: Vissāmetvā balaṃ tattha, vasaṃ katipaye dine;
anya-e0703n0:11848: Tato taṃ sāmiko disvā, sahāyo me ayaṃciraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11849: Tasmā na sakkā caḍḍetuṃ, āpade saraṇāgataṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11851: Sāmino ca sahāyassa, niddosohaṃ kathaṃ bhave;
anya-e0703n0:11852: Iti cintiya pūvaṃ so, savisaṃ khādiyā’mari.
anya-e0703n0:11854: Kuṭṭhakopi ca teneva, khāditvā pūvakaṃ mato;
anya-e0703n0:11857: Māṇavammo tato dīpe, chattaṃ ussāpayi tadā;
anya-e0703n0:11858: Vārento viya teneva, dukkhaṃ dīpe janassa so.
anya-e0703n0:11861: Samattho kohi taṃ sabbaṃ, vattuṃ paṭipadaṃ naro.
anya-e0703n0:11872: [Ettha māṇavammassa rajjakathāya ūnatā dissati. Ito paṭṭhāya aggabodhissa rajjapaṭibaddhā kathā vira khāyati.]
anya-e0703n0:11876: Dāsi dhammarucinaṃ so, rājinī dīpakampi ca.
anya-e0703n0:11900: Dānabhaṇḍañca so sabbaṃ, sabbesaṃ dāsi pāṇinaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11903: Dhammañca tesaṃ deseti, dātuṃ lokuttaraṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11905: Kammaṃ sovaggiyaṃ tassa, rajje sabbo samācari;
anya-e0703n0:11906: Yaṃ karoti mahīpālo, taṃ tassa kurute jano.
anya-e0703n0:11915: Vinayaṃ yanti sabbepi, kotaṃ nāseyya paṇḍito.
anya-e0703n0:11917: Payogo yo hi sattānaṃ, lohadvaya hitāvaho;
anya-e0703n0:11920: Attano so nivatthāni, vatthāni sukhumāni ca;
anya-e0703n0:11924: Sāvajjo paribhogo vā, tassa nāhosi sabbaso.
anya-e0703n0:11926: Ye ye sattā yadā hārā, tesaṃ taṃ taṃ sadāpayi;
anya-e0703n0:11927: Ye yena sukhī honti, te te tena sukhāpayī.
anya-e0703n0:11932: Atha tassa nujo rājā, kassapo hoti khattiyo;
anya-e0703n0:11935: Pitā viya niyaṃ puttaṃ, so saṅgaṇhi mahājanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11954: Mato pubbeva tasmā, so saranto taṃ na icchitaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:11959: Teneva vuttaṃ muninā, dhammā yekeci lokiyā;
anya-e0703n0:11962: Kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma, sabbe te honti pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11965: Ādipādova so tasmā, hutvā rajjaṃ vicārayi;
anya-e0703n0:11971: Desaṃ datvāna pācinaṃ, vasituṃ tattha pesiya;
anya-e0703n0:11977: Adatvā yācakānaṃ so, nu kiñci paribhuñjati;
anya-e0703n0:11978: Bhuttaṃ vā satiyā deti, dvi guṇaṃ attabhuttato.
anya-e0703n0:11993: Mato āsi tato tassa, rajjaṃ hatthagataṃ ahu.
anya-e0703n0:11995: So taṃ hatthagataṃ katvā, saṇṭhapetvāna sāsanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:11998: Sa āgantvā ahu rājā, silāmeghoti saññito;
anya-e0703n0:12001: So rājā naṃ niyojetvā, cintā bhāraṃ vimuñciya;
anya-e0703n0:12002: Bhoge bhuñjatha tumheti, sayaṃ rajjaṃ vicārayi.
anya-e0703n0:12005: Dese ubbinayaṃ sabbaṃ, maggaṃ pāpesi cakkhumā.
anya-e0703n0:12008: Na labhantā vicintesuṃ, bhinditabbā ime iti.
anya-e0703n0:12011: Tuvaṃ rājāsi nāmena, rājā añño sabhāvaho.
anya-e0703n0:12014: Saṅgayha na cireneva, hoti rājā na saṃsayo.
anya-e0703n0:12017: Kumāropi vidhitvā taṃ, coro hutvāna rājindo.
anya-e0703n0:12019: Palāyitvā sakaṃ desaṃ, saṅgaṇhitvā tahiṃ jane;
anya-e0703n0:12023: Gato tattha parājitvā, kumāro malayaṃ vaso.
anya-e0703n0:12025: Tato rājā kataññū so, upakāraṃ sabhātuno;
anya-e0703n0:12028: Kumāropi ca taṃ sutvā, ahosi muducittako;
anya-e0703n0:12031: Rājā gantvā sayaṃyeva, malayaṃ ekako vaṃso;
anya-e0703n0:12032: Kumāraṃ taṃ samādāya, āgamittha sakaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12037: Tāya saddhiṃ vasanto so, vissattho tena rājinā;
anya-e0703n0:12038: Pahāraṃ tāya pādāsi, duṭṭho dosamhi kismiṃci.
anya-e0703n0:12041: Akāraṇe maṃ māreti, dinno vo sāmiko iti.
anya-e0703n0:12043: Sopi taṃ sutamatteva, dukkataṃ vata me iti;
anya-e0703n0:12044: Pabbājesi lahuṃ gantvā, bhikkhūnī na mupassayaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12050: Aññato taṃ gahetvāna, gato ekova rohaṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12058: Kasiṇaṃ rohaṇaṃ hattha-gataṃ katvā mahā balo;
anya-e0703n0:12059: Yujjhitvā tena taṃ gaṇhi, bhariyaṃ saṅghamattano.
anya-e0703n0:12061: Tato paṭṭhāya sukhitā, samaggā te tayo janā;
anya-e0703n0:12067: Hatthi kucchivihāre ca, vihāre puna piṭṭhike;
anya-e0703n0:12071: Kāsi pākatikaṃ tattha, thambhe ca parivattayi.
anya-e0703n0:12073: Evaṃ katvāna puññāni, puññāni ca yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12082: Mahābodhissa kāresi, gharaṃ jiṇṇaṃ navaṃ thiraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12083: Ārāme dve ca kāresi, kaḷandaṃ mallavātakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12097: Tato pubbeva tassāsi, putto so yuvarājako;
anya-e0703n0:12098: Mato kira tato rajjaṃ, aputtaṃ taṃ tadā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:12100: Putto mahindo nāmā’si, silā meghassa rājino;
anya-e0703n0:12106: Datvā tesaṃ dhanaṃ sādhu, pavattiṃ taṃ nigūhayi;
anya-e0703n0:12107: Atha naṃ so vayappattaṃ, katvā senāpatiṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12109: Rajjaṃ vasseva katvāna, sabbaṃ hatthe sayaṃvasī;
anya-e0703n0:12110: So dhammena vicāresi, rāja kiccaṃ mahāmati.
anya-e0703n0:12113: Senāpaccaṃ na gaṇhittha, nayaññū tassa hatthako.
anya-e0703n0:12115: Tadā kenaci gantvā so, karaṇīyena rājino;
anya-e0703n0:12119: Corā rajjaṃ gahetvāna, nāseyyuṃ nagaraṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:12124: So taṃ sutvā mahāseno, gantvā uttaradesakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12127: Gantvā rañño mataṭhānaṃ, disvā deviṃ parodiya;
anya-e0703n0:12130: Mācintesi mahādevī, mato me sāmiko iti;
anya-e0703n0:12131: Rakkhissāmi ahaṃ dīpaṃ, tumhe rajjaṃ karissatha.
anya-e0703n0:12134: Raho yojayī taṃ hantuṃ, vatthukāmā yathāruciṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12136: Senāpati taṃ ñatvāna, tassā’rakkhaṃ vidhāya so;
anya-e0703n0:12140: Ādāya taṃ puraṃ gantvā, rajjaṃ gaṇhi sasādhanaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12151: Deviñca taṃ samādāya, agamā tattha sajjukaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12157: Palāpetvāna taṃ tattha, senāpati sukhaṃ vasi.
anya-e0703n0:12160: Dese sabbe samāgamma, aggahesuṃ puraṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n0:12162: So hi te paṭibāhesi, sūro dhīraparakkamo;
anya-e0703n0:12168: Pacchā anu balappatto, dappulo malayaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n0:12178: Gajjitena bhaṭānañca, ākāsaṃ na tadā phali.
anya-e0703n0:12184: Nagaraṃ no’parundhiṃsu, kintu kattabba mettha vo.
anya-e0703n0:12186: Evaṃ vuttā tamāhaṃsu, sūrā tassa raṇatthino;
anya-e0703n0:12189: Evaṃ bhūte sace kāle, ohīnā jīvibhatthino;
anya-e0703n0:12190: Posesi sāmi kiṃ kāla-mettakaṃ no yathā sukhaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12192: Vutte evaṃ saussāho, balaṃ sajjiya rattiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12196: Saddhiṃ yo dhasahassehi, saṅgāmaṃ kāsi dussahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12198: Balaṃ taṃ ādipādassa, nipphoṭetvā tato tato;
anya-e0703n0:12204: Rājaputte duve ceva, rohaṇamhā tadā gate;
anya-e0703n0:12205: Jīvaggāhaṃ sagāhetvā, te ādāya puraṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:12207: Evaṃ pattajayo sūro, dīpe jāte nirākule;
anya-e0703n0:12210: Tepi gantvāna desaṃ taṃ, uttaraṃ desameva ca;
anya-e0703n0:12213: Rājāpi taṃ mahādeviṃ, bhariyaṃ kāsi attano;
anya-e0703n0:12219: Rañño sā’tipiyā āsi, tato paṭṭhāya sopi kho;
anya-e0703n0:12223: Vinā so’yanti amhākaṃ, ubho hutvāna ekato.
anya-e0703n0:12229: Rājā sabbaṃ nisamme’taṃ, maṇḍalīke tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12240: Atha rājā mahāseno, samugghātesi taṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12241: Dappuḷo so palāyittha, ādi pādā duve hatā.
anya-e0703n0:12252: Rājā so puttanattānaṃ, desaṃ kātuṃ nirākulaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12258: Ārocetvā pavattiṃ taṃ, tehi sammā pakāsito;
anya-e0703n0:12261: Dīpe sabbattha yojetvā, kattabbaṃ nagarepi ca;
anya-e0703n0:12265: Taṃ disvā rohaṇe sabbe, bhītā taṃ vasamāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12268: Hatthī asse ca maṇayo, gahetvā tassa hatthato.
anya-e0703n0:12303: Jiṇṇe devakūle katvā, bahuke tattha tattha so;
anya-e0703n0:12312: Anāthā ye salajjā ca, te ca saṅgaṇhi so raho;
anya-e0703n0:12319: Puññamevaṃ vidhaṃ tassa, appameyyaṃ bahuṃ kira.
anya-e0703n0:12321: Tassa putto tadā āsi, yuvarājā divaṅgato;
anya-e0703n0:12322: Jāto senāpati kāle, aparo atthi dārako.
anya-e0703n0:12324: Taṃ rājā rājaputtehi, bhīto rājāraho iti;
anya-e0703n0:12325: Māretuṃ taṃ na sakkonti, vaḍḍhapesi yathā tathā.
anya-e0703n0:12327: Arīhi nagare ruddhe, pitaraṃ so kirekadā;
anya-e0703n0:12333: Kāloyamīti mantvā so, bandhitvā churikaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n0:12337: Rājā disvā pasanno taṃ, senāpaccañca tassa’dā.
anya-e0703n0:12364: Accaye pituno rājā, uparājā ahosi so;
anya-e0703n0:12367: Senā nāmasi sappaññā, mahesī tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n0:12373: Datvā ṭhānantaraṃ rājā, tesaṃ tesaṃ yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12376: Atha kenāpi so gantvā, hetunā maṇihīrakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12377: Vasanto kira assosi, paccanto kupito iti.
anya-e0703n0:12380: Gantvā sādhetha taṃ desa-mīti pesesi sajjukaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12383: Vatvā yaṃkiñci bhindiṃsu, te ubhopi narādhipe.
anya-e0703n0:12385: Tato dve verino hutvā, desaṃ gaṇhitumārabhuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12388: Te ubho tattha ghātetvā, tesaṃ sabbaṃ samādiya;
anya-e0703n0:12389: Hantvā taṃ pakkhiye sabbe, puḷatthinagaraṃ gami.
anya-e0703n0:12395: Disvā rājāpi santuṭṭho, taṃ saṅgaṇhi yathārahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12397: Tena mettiṃ thiraṃ kātuṃ, dhītaraṃ deva nāmikaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12415: Pāsāde cetiyo ceva, vihāre ca anappake;
anya-e0703n0:12427: Pitarā ca mahādānaṃ, puññamaññampi vā kataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12428: Sabbaṃ tamavināsetvā, niccaṃ so rakkhi sādaro.
anya-e0703n0:12434: Bhikkhusaṅghassa sā gāmaṃ, mahummārañca tassa dā.
anya-e0703n0:12440: Datvā te me cayitvāna, vihārasseva dāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:12443: Nānārāge dhaje ceva, paṭākāyo ca pūjayi.
anya-e0703n0:12464: Puññanti vuttaṃ sabbaṃ so, na kiñci parivajjayi.
anya-e0703n0:12467: Bhojanaṃ bhojanatthīnaṃ, bahu so dāsi rattiyaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12472: Evaṃ puññāni katvāna, narindo so sapāriso;
anya-e0703n0:12475: Tato tassa suto āsi, sīhaḷānaṃ rathesato;
anya-e0703n0:12482: Sabbaṃ kāsi ahāpetvā, adhammaṃ tu vivajjayi.
anya-e0703n0:12488: Rajjaṃ katvāna catūsu, vassesu nidhanaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:12490: Aggabodhi tato rājā, chattaṃ ussāpayi pure;
anya-e0703n0:12497: Nāmaṃ gahetvā pituno, attano ca narādhipo.
anya-e0703n0:12508: Bhikkhū vā cetiye vā so, vanditvā nikkhamaṃ tato;
anya-e0703n0:12509: Vālukā hā vinassantu, iti pādesu vodhayī.
anya-e0703n0:12511: Yaṃ yaṃ sovaggiyaṃ kammaṃ, kammaṃ nissaraṇavahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12512: Vatthuttaye pasanno so, kammaṃ taṃ sabbamācari.
anya-e0703n0:12515: Gantvā tassā upaṭṭhānaṃ, pātova kira bhūpati.
anya-e0703n0:12523: Tassa toyena siñcitvā, sīsaṃ samakuṭaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12524: Gandhamālāhi taṃ sammā, cetiyaṃ viha pūjiya.
anya-e0703n0:12526: Namassitvāna tikkhattuṃ, katvā taṃ so padakkhiṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12544: Ṭhatvā adassane ṭhāne, tikkhattuṃ puna vandiya;
anya-e0703n0:12545: Santuṭṭho tena kammena, saranto taṃ punappunaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12554: Evaṃ puññaparo hutvā, katvā dīpassa saṅgahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12563: So te disvā pavattiṃ taṃ, sutvā datvā mahābalaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12565: Pāhesi pitarā yuddhaṃ, kātuṃ bandhu hite rate;
anya-e0703n0:12569: Te ubhopi palāyiṃsu, datvā senāya nāyakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12574: Yujjhanto maraṇaṃ gañchi, ñātisopi mato kira;
anya-e0703n0:12578: So dappuḷaṃ ṭhapetvāna, sevatthaṃ tassa rājino.
anya-e0703n0:12584: Rājākāsi dumindassa, gharaṃ jiṇṇaṃ navaṃ thiraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12586: Sovaṇṇakhacitaṃ kammaṃ, maṅgalena ca tassa so;
anya-e0703n0:12593: Vihāre jetanāme ca, katvā sovaṇṇayaṃ muniṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12611: Tasmiṃ rājini sampatte, devalokaṃ tadā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:12634: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ yāguṃ, sabbe gaṇhiṃsu sādarā;
anya-e0703n0:12638: Evamādiṃ sa katvāna, puññavaṃ vassehi tīhi ca.
anya-e0703n0:12641: Rājā dibbena yānena, gacchanto viya so mari.
anya-e0703n0:12653: Tato tassā’nujo seno, chattaṃ ussāpayī pure;
anya-e0703n0:12654: Piyaṃ’va puttaṃ passanto, satte sabbe mahādhano.
anya-e0703n0:12680: Rājā tasmiṃ akujjhitvā, sandhiṃ katvā akuppiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12683: Evaṃ samaggā te āsuṃ, tato paṭṭhāya khattiyā;
anya-e0703n0:12695: Vasantā damiḷā ettha, bahavo ye tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12696: Sabbe taṃ pakkhiyāhesuṃ, tato so balavā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:12710: Rājā senāya bhinnattaṃ, sukkā sabbaṃ samādiya;
anya-e0703n0:12716: Ekename na sakkā ve, sabbe etehi mārituṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12717: Etesaṃ na ca nīcānaṃ, hatthesu maraṇaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12719: Tasmā varaṃ me maraṇaṃ, mayā eveti cintiya;
anya-e0703n0:12722: Taṃ disvā bahavo sīse, tattha chindiṃsu sevakā;
anya-e0703n0:12723: Taṃ disvā damiḷī senā, haṭṭhatuṭṭhā pamodisā.
anya-e0703n0:12731: Supaṇṇo viya gaṇhanto, bhūjagena salilāla ye;
anya-e0703n0:12732: So taṃ sabbaṃ nivattesi, attānañca sugopayi.
anya-e0703n0:12737: Kiṃ me ekena verinaṃ, pūritena manorathaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12746: So taṃ disvā ca jhāpetvā, rājūnaṃ paṇḍudesinaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12756: Suvaṇṇa paṭimāyo ca, vihāresu tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12758: Sabbaṃ gahetvā nissāraṃ, laṅkādīpa makāsi so;
anya-e0703n0:12761: Rājā’pi rakkhaṃ datvāna, mahāmagge tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12765: Amacce tattha pesesi, disvā te sīhalādhipo.
anya-e0703n0:12767: Suṇitvā sāsanaṃ tesaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ sampaṭicchiya;
anya-e0703n0:12776: Nikkhamitvā purā gantvā, na cireneva paṭṭanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12777: Tattha āruyha nāvaṃ so, saka desa mupāgami.
anya-e0703n0:12782: Bhātaraṃ dutiyaṃ katvā, udayaṃ nāma khattiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12785: Sopi kho na cireneva, katvā puññaṃ yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12794: Yo senaṃ sabbapaṭhamo, seno nāma kumārako;
anya-e0703n0:12803: Tadā jeṭṭhasutaṃ tassa, mahindaṃ nāma khattiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12814: Tato kassapanāmaṃ so, tesaṃ jeṭṭhaṃ narissaro;
anya-e0703n0:12815: Desaṃ taṃ gaṇha yāhīti, datvā balamapesayi.
anya-e0703n0:12817: So’pi gantvāna taṃ hantvā, rohaṇaṃ kasiṇampi taṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12820: Atha so bhātaro dve’pi, senañca udayaṃ tathā;
anya-e0703n0:12823: Rājā tā sādhu vaḍḍhetvā, vayapattāsu tīsu so;
anya-e0703n0:12835: Evaṃ karonto ñātīnaṃ, saṃgahaṃ so yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12845: Ārāmike ca bahavo, dāse kammakarepi ca.
anya-e0703n0:12850: Vaḍḍhetvā tattha kāretvā, sabba sovaṇṇayaṃ jinaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12860: Saddhiṃ so saṅghanāmāya, deviyāpi ca attano.
anya-e0703n0:12893: Mahādevena so āsi, rammo dappula pabbato.
anya-e0703n0:12896: Ubhopi te vippakate, rājā so vasamāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:12907: Tato vīsati vassesu, pulatthi nagare vasaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12911: Pahāya dīpaṃ dīpo’va, mahāvāta hato gato.
anya-e0703n0:12923: Evaṃ tasmiṃ mate tassa, kātabbaṃ sādhukāriya;
anya-e0703n0:12926: Āgamma nagaraṃ rājā, ahosi dharaṇī tale;
anya-e0703n0:12938: Bhariyā tassa yā āsi, saṅghātaṃ so bhisecayi;
anya-e0703n0:12941: Mahindaṃ nāma sappaññaṃ, kaṇiṭṭhaṃ bhātaraṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:12947: Uppajjittha tadā putto, rañño saṅghāya deviyā;
anya-e0703n0:12962: Nikāyattaya vā sīhi, saddhiṃ bhikkhūhi āgato;
anya-e0703n0:12965: Yā tassa yuvarājassa, bhariyā tissā nāmikā;
anya-e0703n0:12968: Kittināmā’parāyā ca, bhariyā sāpi kho pana;
anya-e0703n0:12969: Vijāyi putte cattāro, tathā ekañca dhītaraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:12971: Tadā rājāpi cintetvā, evaṃ sati kaṇiṭṭhako;
anya-e0703n0:12972: Nissaṅko mayi hotīti, sammā mantīhi mantiya.
anya-e0703n0:12990: Suññaṃ piṭṭhaṃ sayaṃ disvā, kasmā evanti saṃvadi.
anya-e0703n0:12996: Sabbaṃ sāragataṃ dīpe, samādāya gato iti.
anya-e0703n0:12998: Taṃ sutvā lajjito rājā, sayaṃ viya parājito;
anya-e0703n0:13004: Rājā disvā’ti santuṭṭho, kattabbaṃ tassa kāriya;
anya-e0703n0:13013: Ratanaṃ sabbamādāya, datvā rajjaṃ imassa ca;
anya-e0703n0:13029: Vegasā taṃ samāgamma, yuddhaṃ kātuṃ samārabhi.
anya-e0703n0:13031: Asampuṇṇa balattā so, viddho sallena bhūpati;
anya-e0703n0:13043: Sāraṃ sabbaṃsamādāya, dese ca nagare ṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13046: Paṇḍurāja kumāraṃ tu, tattha rajje’bhi siñciya;
anya-e0703n0:13050: Tattha tattha yathā kāmaṃ, vasanto akuto bhayo.
anya-e0703n0:13053: Kīḷanto viya nāvaṃ so, samāruyha visārado.
anya-e0703n0:13056: Taṃ sāsanaṃ nivedetvā, sāraṃ dassesi āhaṭaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13058: Rājā sādhūti vatvāna, kāretvā tassa saṅgahaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13059: Saddhiṃ senāya āgantvā, pakaṭṭhāya sakaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13064: Sabbaṃ pākatikaṃ kāsi, sāraṃ dīpe nirālayo;
anya-e0703n0:13073: Khinnā pubbassa rājassa, kāle dīpamhi pāṇino;
anya-e0703n0:13074: Nibbutā taṃ samāgamma, ghammā viya valāhakā.
anya-e0703n0:13082: Bodhigehaṃ karonto taṃ, disvā vaḍḍhakīno tadā;
anya-e0703n0:13086: So taṃ taṃ mupasaṃkamma, mahāpūjāya pūjiya.
anya-e0703n0:13091: Sākhā gacchaṃ tu uddhaṃva, kātuṃ sakkā yathāgharaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13106: Evaṃ khuddānu khuddāni, katvā puññāni so vibhū;
anya-e0703n0:13110: Tassa ṭhāne ṭhapetvāna, sabbaṃ tasseva tassadā.
anya-e0703n0:13131: Tuccho yaṃ neva hotūti, vāsaṃ saṅghassa taṃ akā.
anya-e0703n0:13133: Bhogagāme ca tassadā, rakkhake ca niyojayi;
anya-e0703n0:13154: Rāja taṃ bodhisattañca, sagharaṃ tattha sannahi;
anya-e0703n0:13173: Annaṃ pānañca vatthañca, tesaṃ datvā yathāruciṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13178: Tassa rañño mahesī ca, saṅghanāmā akārayi;
anya-e0703n0:13190: Tato tassā’nujo āsi, udayo nāma khattiyo;
anya-e0703n0:13193: Hutvā so sayaṃ rājā, kaṇiṭṭhaṃ sakabhātaraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13196: Rājā cintiya ñātīnaṃ, kātabbo saṅgaho iti;
anya-e0703n0:13208: Janaṃ hattagataṃ katvā, desaṃ sabbaṃ vināsiya;
anya-e0703n0:13212: Ānetuṃ tamupāyaṃ so, gavesanto tathā tathā.
anya-e0703n0:13215: Āmantesi mahāpuñña, sahāyo hoti me iti.
anya-e0703n0:13218: Putto tava mahindo so, vuddhippatto mahābalo.
anya-e0703n0:13226: Taṃ sutvā vacanaṃ rañño, kassapo bhāsi sādaro;
anya-e0703n0:13227: Deva devena vutto’haṃ, gaccheyyaṃ kintu me suto.
anya-e0703n0:13229: Vaṃso me pālito hoti, pasādo ca tavādhipa;
anya-e0703n0:13230: Tasmā kālamahāpetvā, yaṃ icchasi tathā kuru.
anya-e0703n0:13232: Sutvā atīvasantuṭṭho, narindo tassa taṃ vaco;
anya-e0703n0:13238: Tucchaṃ viya puraṃ katvā, sabbañca balavāhanaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13248: Tato jānapadā sabbe, maṇḍalikā ca raṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0703n0:13251: Gantvā taṃ parivāresuṃ, laddho no sāmiko iti.
anya-e0703n0:13253: Patanto sopi kho coro, ṭhitova girimaṇḍale;
anya-e0703n0:13257: Mahindasenā ghātentī, tassa senaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13260: Disvā malayapādamhi, gahetvā ettha so iti.
anya-e0703n0:13271: Tamādāya’ti tuṭṭho so, jano āgamma sajjukaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13289: Duṭṭhe ca paṭibāhetvā, maṇḍalīke ca raṭṭhiye.
anya-e0703n0:13303: Rājāpi disvā taṃ kuddho, khippaṃ pakkhippa cārake;
anya-e0703n0:13306: Adāsi ca tulābhāraṃ, tikkhattuṃ so mahāyaso;
anya-e0703n0:13340: Tato rajje patiṭṭhāya, kassapo dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13347: Dānaṃ daṇḍissaraṃ nāma, sadā dāpesi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n0:13354: Taṃ sutvā kupito rājā, balaṃ pesesi attano;
anya-e0703n0:13355: Yujjhitvā taṃ parājesi, mahindo so mahābhaṭo.
anya-e0703n0:13357: Tato rājā nivattetuṃ, pitaraṃ tassa pesayi;
anya-e0703n0:13358: Kassapaṃ yuvarājaṃ taṃ, so gantvā puttasantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13363: Ādipādo tu so pacchā, ghātetvā maṇḍalādhipe;
anya-e0703n0:13367: Datvā so dhītaraṃ tassā, pesesi puna rohaṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13370: Gāhāpesi nave bhikkhū, āvāse tattha tattha so.
anya-e0703n0:13375: Akāsi ca nikāyesu, tīsu bimbe silāmaye;
anya-e0703n0:13384: Thale jale ca sattānaṃ, adāsi abhayaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n0:13397: Ekamekaṃ kuṭiṃ katvā, dāpesi ca camūpati.
anya-e0703n0:13399: Rattamālagirismiṃ so, katvā rammaṃ taraṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13420: Bhesajjagehaṃ kāresi, nagare tattha tattha so;
anya-e0703n0:13436: Bhikkhūnaṃ so adā sādhu, ṭhapetvā vattamuttamaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13448: Yathā kammaṃ gato ṭhatvā, vassāni dasasatta ca.
anya-e0703n0:13454: Vattā so maramantiva, cāgavā dhanado viya.
anya-e0703n0:13465: Bhūmicando narindo so, vaṃse jātassa attano;
anya-e0703n0:13471: So dhetvā sāsanaṃ sabbaṃ, dhammakammena satthuno;
anya-e0703n0:13511: Nagare vajjasālā ca, tesaṃ gāme ca dāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:13538: Akāsi pāḷikaṃ nāma, pāsādaṃ sumano haraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13543: Tassā puttosi siddhattho, nāma issariye ṭhito;
anya-e0703n0:13546: Rājā tasmiṃ mate katvā, sālaṃ bhikkhunamuttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13549: Evaṃ dhammena kārente, rajjaṃ laṅkādīpe tadā;
anya-e0703n0:13577: Vaḍḍhesi tena taṃ puttaṃ, katvā senāya nāyakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13582: Sāsanassa ca lokassa, santiṃ katvā anekadhā;
anya-e0703n0:13583: Rājā so dasame vasse, sukhena tidivaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:13586: Vattāvādī kavī so satidhītivisado desako bhāvako ca;
anya-e0703n0:13588: Rājindo kassapo’yaṃ viya vimalaguṇo hotulokopi sabbo.
anya-e0703n0:13602: Rājā so sattame māse, paviṭṭho paccuno mukhaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13611: Mahābhogaṃ adā tassa, nivāsesi purā bahi.
anya-e0703n0:13625: Āvāsaṃ rakkhako nāma, tassa senāpatī akā;
anya-e0703n0:13628: Kataṃ taṃ pubbarājehi, rājā so paripāliya;
anya-e0703n0:13640: Tadā jānapadā ceva, nāgarā ca balāni ca;
anya-e0703n0:13649: Taṃ sutvā yuvarājā ca, ādipādo ca taṃ sakhā;
anya-e0703n0:13656: Yatīnaṃ purato tesaṃ, nipajjitvā urena te.
anya-e0703n0:13671: Ādāya te vanaṃ tesaṃ, netvā rājagharaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:13676: Laṃkābhisekaṃ patvāna, seno so matimā tato;
anya-e0703n0:13677: Udayaṃ ādipādaṃ taṃ, yuvarājaṃ akā sakhaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13701: Pariveṇaṃ nāgasālaṃ, disvā gāma madā tadā.
anya-e0703n0:13704: Maṇḍapāni ca rammāni, dhātupūjaṃ akā sadā.
anya-e0703n0:13712: Niddālu majjapo āsi, rājā pāpena jantunaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13718: Tāni nādāsi so rājā, tena coḷo mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n0:13721: Tadā senāpati ettha, paccante kupite gato;
anya-e0703n0:13724: Hato senāpati tattha, yujjhi na raṇe mato;
anya-e0703n0:13725: Kakūṭādīni ādāya, rājā so rohaṇaṃ agā.
anya-e0703n0:13728: Nivattitvā sakaṃ raṭṭhaṃ, agamāsi idhatā bhayā.
anya-e0703n0:13749: Bhutvā niggahasaṅgahehi sakalaṃ lokaṃ vase vattiya;
anya-e0703n0:13751: Iccevaṃ satataṃ sarantu sujanā hātuṃ pamādaṃ madaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13758: Tato laṅkābhisekaṃ so, patvā seno kamāgataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13762: Yutto dayāya mettāya, rājā so sabbadā ahu.
anya-e0703n0:13765: Raṭṭhe tasmiṃ vasantā’suṃ, sukhitā nibbhayā sadā.
anya-e0703n0:13786: Tassā puttā duve jātā, dhītā ekā manoramā.
anya-e0703n0:13792: Pesesi nāgadīpaṃ so, sutvā taṃ bhūpati idha.
anya-e0703n0:13798: Yujjhitvā taṃ vināsetvā, gaṇhi so yuddhamaṇḍale.
anya-e0703n0:13800: Asakkento imaṃ jetuṃ, rājā naṃ vallabhādayo;
anya-e0703n0:13806: Saddhammaṃ kathāyantānaṃ, katvā sammā na muttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13807: Dhammaṃ sutvāna so rājā, pasanno buddhasāsane.
anya-e0703n0:13813: Dāpesi vipulaṃ suddhaṃ, sadā ekadine viya.
anya-e0703n0:13816: Pesesi bhojanaṃ suddhaṃ, mahagghaṃ vipulaṃ sadā.
anya-e0703n0:13860: Kathāpesi ca bhikkhūhi, byattehi vinayaṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n0:13872: Tassa vatthāni bhājetvā, bhikkhūnaṃ dāpayī sayaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13874: Sadā so attano rajje, uyyānesu tahiṃtahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13890: Catunnaṃ cetiyānaṃ so, ramanīyaṃ gharaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n0:13910: Sā tasmiṃ pariveṇe ca, akā kappāsagāmake;
anya-e0703n0:13926: Katvā soḷasame vasse, rājā so tidivaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n0:13928: Jāto paṭicca taṃ rājaṃ, senā dvādasavassiko;
anya-e0703n0:13932: Pitu senāpati seno, tassa senāpati ahu.
anya-e0703n0:13935: Mātarā saha vattantaṃ, kaṇiṭṭhaṃ tassa bhātaraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13940: Taṃ sutvā kupito hutvā, seno senāpati tadā;
anya-e0703n0:13944: Rakkhāmi taṃ amaccanti, gato nikkhamma rohaṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13952: Yujjhituṃ tena so rājā, balaṃ pesesi rohaṇā;
anya-e0703n0:13953: Senāpati vināsesi, sabbaṃ taṃ rājino balaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:13955: Damiḷā te janapadaṃ, pīḷetvā rakkhasā viya;
anya-e0703n0:13959: Nivedesuṃ pavattiṃ taṃ, mantetvā sacīvehi so.
anya-e0703n0:13967: Vasante tattha laṃkinde, ahitā vallabhā janā;
anya-e0703n0:13970: Majjapāne guṇaṃ vatvā, pāyesuṃ taṃ mahīpatiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13971: Pivitvā majjapānaṃ so, mattabyāḷo ahu tadā.
anya-e0703n0:13973: Āhārānaṃ khayaṃ patvā, cajitvā dullabhaṃ padaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:13974: Mato so dasame vasse, taruṇoyeva bhūpati.
anya-e0703n0:13985: Mahindo taṃ kaṇiṭṭho so, rājaputto tadaccaye;
anya-e0703n0:13994: Accantaṃ khīṇacitto so, vassamhi dasame vibhū;
anya-e0703n0:13997: Aladdha vuttino sabbe, keraḷā sahitā tato;
anya-e0703n0:13998: Na vuttidānaṃ no yāva, hoti mātāva bhuñjatu.
anya-e0703n0:14007: Bhātu jāyamma hesitte, ṭhapetvā so tahiṃ vasī.
anya-e0703n0:14018: Tato sesesu ṭhānesu, keraḷā sīhaḷā tadā;
anya-e0703n0:14025: Balaṃ mahantaṃ balavā, taṃ khippaṃ laṃkamotari.
anya-e0703n0:14030: Chattiṃse rājino vasse, mahesiṃ ratanāni ca;
anya-e0703n0:14039: Mahīpālaṃ dhanaṃ tañca, sabbaṃ hatthagataṃ tato;
anya-e0703n0:14045: Bhinditvā sahasā sabbe, vihāre ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14058: Sabbaṃ te rohaṇaṃ desaṃ, saṅkhobhesu mito tato.
anya-e0703n0:14067: Katvā chamāsaṃ saṅgāmaṃ, haniṃsu damiḷe bahūṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14072: Kumāro jayito disvā, ubho te sacive tadā;
anya-e0703n0:14075: Buddho paveṇigāmaṃ so, varaṃ yācittha kittiko;
anya-e0703n0:14076: Saṅghikaṃ gahitaṃ bhāgaṃ, vissajjetuṃ varaṃ vari.
anya-e0703n0:14079: Niddarā sādarā vīrā, pāde vandiṃsu tassa te.
anya-e0703n0:14097: So rājā damiḷe hantuṃ, dhanaṃ sañciya’nekādhā;
anya-e0703n0:14103: Na yāva rājaraṭṭhassa, gahaṇaṃ hoti tāva me;
anya-e0703n0:14109: Yujjhituṃ samayo neti, dvādase vacchare lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14119: Sahatthena sakaṃ sīsaṃ, chinditvā sahasā mari.
anya-e0703n0:14124: Bhayā saraṭṭhaṃ hitvā’tha, duṭṭhadese vasaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n0:14134: Tato cattāri vassāni, rajjaṃ kāresi rohaṇe.
anya-e0703n0:14136: Tampi coḷāraṇe hantvā, mahesiṃ dhītarā saha;
anya-e0703n0:14140: Akā vassadvayaṃ coḷā, ghātesuṃ tampi yujjhiya.
anya-e0703n0:14176: Tato bhāviniṃ siddhi, mapekkhaṃ nayanaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14180: Varaṃ padāya nabhasā, rājamāno gato tato.
anya-e0703n0:14192: Pāletu iti so rajjaṃ, sampattaṃ sampaṭikkhipi.
anya-e0703n0:14210: Katvā taṃ pariveṇassa, sāmikaṃ dharaṇī pati.
anya-e0703n0:14213: Parihāre adā tassa, pessavagge ca pañca so.
anya-e0703n0:14219: Rājā ca lokaṃ pālesi, sammā tassānusiṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0703n0:14231: Devalā lokikā cāti, nāmato vissutā subhā.
anya-e0703n0:14236: Sā moggallāna lokavhe, putte dve labhi sobhane;
anya-e0703n0:14246: Guṇaṃ sabbattha vaṇṇesuṃ, tasmiṃ devā pasīdiya.
anya-e0703n0:14248: Guṇaṃ suṇitvā laṃkindo, tadā sabbattha patthaṭaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14260: Yato bhikkhū samūhetvā, vāsaṃ kappesi yattha so;
anya-e0703n0:14275: Sā taṃ paṭicca kittiñca, mittaṃ nāma kumārikaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14276: Mahindaṃ rakkhitaṃ cāpi, latittha caturo pajā.
anya-e0703n0:14288: Kittādike jane neke, vase vattiya sabbathā.
anya-e0703n0:14294: Saṅgho nāma kumārassa, sarūpaṃ sādhuvaṃ bravi.
anya-e0703n0:14302: Tassa so vacanaṃ sutvā, sevitabbo kumārako;
anya-e0703n0:14305: Suṇitvā so vaco tesaṃ, nivattanabhayā vibhū;
anya-e0703n0:14311: Tahiṃ so nivasaṃ vīro, pesayitvā sasevake;
anya-e0703n0:14314: Tato’bhimānī senānī, senaṃ so tattha pesayi;
anya-e0703n0:14323: Tadāpi senaṃ senindo, pesetvā asakiṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14341: Lokanāmo camūnātho, lokaṃ hitvā sakaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n0:14350: Kesādhātu tato yuddhe, bhinditvā damiḷaṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14359: Pavattiṃ taṃ suṇitvā so, sābhimāno bhusaṃtato;
anya-e0703n0:14366: Dukkaraṃ ettha yuddhanti, gato so khadiraṅgaṇiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14394: Caturo caturopāye, yo jayaṃ tattha so vasī.
anya-e0703n0:14418: Upaggamma janā sabbe, karaṃ no denti sabbaso.
anya-e0703n0:14424: Senaṃ mahantiṃ datvāna, pesesi sacivaṃ nijaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14444: Rañño bhaṭā vināsetvā, sabbaṃ taṃ damiḷaṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14450: Tahiṃ taṃ sakalaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, netvā rañño padassiya;
anya-e0703n0:14453: Mahīpālopi taṃ sutvā, sacivānaṃ vaco tadā;
anya-e0703n0:14462: Taṃ vijāniya bhūmindo, senindaṃ pesayī sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14468: Patiṃsu tasmiṃ saṅgāme, bhūpālassa narā bahū;
anya-e0703n0:14489: Atho laṃkissaro tattha, khippaṃ gantvā mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n0:14493: Ṭhānā kubulagallā ca, yujjhanto taṃ palāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:14498: Tadā narissaro tata, tassa sabbaṃ samādiya;
anya-e0703n0:14504: Tato rājā samavhāya, sacīve dve mahabbale;
anya-e0703n0:14505: Pesesi dikkhiṇaṃ passaṃ, vasaṃ netuṃ tahiṃ jane.
anya-e0703n0:14526: Vikkamāti sayaṃ sutvā, kālaññū so mahīpahi.
anya-e0703n0:14537: Tattha tattha ṭhitā sūrā, coḷā ye kakkhalā’khilā;
anya-e0703n0:14540: Nikkhamma nagarā gantvā, coḷā bahi mahāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14541: Katvā parājitā bhītā, pavissa nagaraṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14559: Sīhaḷā balavantoti, bhiyyo senaṃ na pāhiṇi.
anya-e0703n0:14587: Pulatthinagaraṃ gañchi, vase vattiya taṃ balaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14602: Datvāna dakkhiṇaṃ desaṃ, taṃ saṅgaṇhi yathāvidhiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14608: Datvā rajje yathāñāyaṃ, karaṃ yojesi gaṇhituṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14617: Tatheva seṭṭhinātho ca, iccete bhātaro tayo.
anya-e0703n0:14622: Te sabbe rohaṇaṃ raṭṭhaṃ, sabbaṃ malayamaṇḍalaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14626: Nighātento bahū tattha, tattha paccatthike jane.
anya-e0703n0:14629: Dakkhiṇo dakkhiṇaṃ desaṃ, sayaṃ gantvā mahabbalo.
anya-e0703n0:14643: Sutvā vaṃsakkamaṃ tassā, so ñatvā suddhavaṃsataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14646: Sā taṃ paṭicca rājānaṃ, mahesī dhītaraṃ labhi;
anya-e0703n0:14650: Vīravammassa pādāsi, sā labhi dhītaro duve.
anya-e0703n0:14652: Samānanāmikā jeṭṭhā, sā mātā mahiyā ahu;
anya-e0703n0:14653: Sugalā nāmikā āsi, tāsu dvīsu kaṇiṭṭhikā.
anya-e0703n0:14661: Subhaddā ca sumittā ca, lokanāthavhayāpi ca;
anya-e0703n0:14665: Sampattā sā pajavuddhiṃ, haranti rājino mataṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14668: Gabbho jātumahīpālaṃ, taṃ paṭicca na saṇṭhahi.
anya-e0703n0:14680: Bhūte ca bhāvino ceva, sabbe bhūpe’tisāyino.
anya-e0703n0:14710: Tesaṃ pādāsi paccekaṃ, vuttiṃ so anurūpakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14719: Saha bhogena pādāsi, tadā bandhu hiterato.
anya-e0703n0:14731: Vicinitvā kulīne so, jane sabbe samādiya;
anya-e0703n0:14809: Attano visayaṃ patte, coḷo sīhaḷa dūtake;
anya-e0703n0:14816: Avhāya damiḷe dūte, iti coḷassa sandisi.
anya-e0703n0:14818: Senaṃ vinā’va ekasmiṃ, dīpe majjhe mahaṇṇave;
anya-e0703n0:14821: Balaṃ sannayha sakalaṃ, rajje tuyhaṃ mamā’tha vā;
anya-e0703n0:14825: Iti vatvāna te dūte, itthalaṅkāra maṇḍite.
anya-e0703n0:14842: Puttehi tīhi sahitaṃ, rājino ca kaṇīyasiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14845: Rājā nikkhamma khippaṃ so, gantvā dakkhiṇapassakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14881: Etā caññā ca so chinna-mariyādā vāpiyo bahū;
anya-e0703n0:14915: Paṭisaṅkharijiṇṇe so, gāme cā’dā visuṃ visuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:14924: Gāme datvāna paccekaṃ, sālāyo cāpi kārayi.
anya-e0703n0:14926: Anāgate taṃ bhūpālā, mā gaṇhantū’ti lekhiya;
anya-e0703n0:14933: Bandhūnampi ca so tesaṃ, bhogagāme padāpayi.
anya-e0703n0:14944: Padinnā pubbarājūhi, ye gāmā rohaṇe bahū;
anya-e0703n0:14945: Tepi sabbe anūne so, yathāpubbaṃ ṭhapesi ca.
anya-e0703n0:14948: Bhattaṃ cā’dāsi so kāka soṇādīnaṃ dayāparo.
anya-e0703n0:14956: Andhānaṃ paṅgulānañca, gāme cā’dā visuṃ visuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:14980: Tadā neke ca sacivā, tasso rodhajanāpi ca;
anya-e0703n0:14990: Gajabāhū’ti vidite, tassa jāte sute tato.
anya-e0703n0:14993: Rohaṇaṃ kasiṇaṃ datvā, tahiṃ vāsāya pesayi.
anya-e0703n0:14995: Tato so tattha gantvāna, mahānāgahulaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15001: Saggaṃ lokaṃ sapuññappabhavamuruphalaṃ passituṃ cā’ru roha.
anya-e0703n0:15008: Tadārañño nujāmittā, tassa puttā tayo’pi ca;
anya-e0703n0:15033: Tā tassāḷāhanaṭṭhāna dassane neva so ahaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15035: Sokabhāraṃ vinodessaṃ, mama ceto gataṃ iti;
anya-e0703n0:15047: Tayo te bhātaro tattha, sampattāva jayā tato;
anya-e0703n0:15051: Saṅgāmesuṃ parājesi, bhiyyo yujjhittha so tayo.
anya-e0703n0:15086: Mātā ca tiṇṇaṃ bhātūnaṃ, jayabāhu ca bhūmipo;
anya-e0703n0:15101: Sutvā tamatthaṃ dūtehi, so vikkamabhujopi ca;
anya-e0703n0:15107: Ripavo dāni me sabbe, ummūlessāmahaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n0:15111: Khippaṃ pāvekkhi kalyāṇiṃ, so’pi te gahaṇatthiko.
anya-e0703n0:15119: So vikkamabhujo sutvā, pavattiṃ bhūbhujo tadā;
anya-e0703n0:15134: Palāyamāno so bhīto, āgantvāna nijaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15141: Pesayitvā sakaṃ sopi, mahantaṃ sakalaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15150: Āvasiṃsu yathāpubbaṃ, gantvā raṭṭhaṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15177: Paṭimāyo ca acchijja, yathākāmaṃ vayaṃ nayī.
anya-e0703n0:15198: Aggiṃ dentā taḷāke ca, chindantā jalapūrite.
anya-e0703n0:15201: Chindantā nāḷikerādi, so pakāre ca bhūruhe.
anya-e0703n0:15222: Iti vattabba taṃyeva, yātaṃ laṅkātalaṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n0:15224: Evaṃ gāmakabhojakā viya bhusaṃtejo vihīnā sadā;
anya-e0703n0:15236: Mittāvhā rājinī ceva, tadā kālamakaṃsu te.
anya-e0703n0:15257: Na dissate pātubhāvo, aho no appapuññatā.
anya-e0703n0:15317: Nemittake ca pucchiṃsu, sunitvā te pamoditā.
anya-e0703n0:15322: Taṃ suṇitvā amaccā ca, tathā nagaravāsino;
anya-e0703n0:15334: Suvinaṭṭhe vihāre ca, dhātugabbhe ca vāpiyo;
anya-e0703n0:15338: Na ciraṃ saṇṭhahi gabbha-varo kucchimhi deviyā.
anya-e0703n0:15346: Suppasannā asesā ca, disāyo taṃkhaṇe ahu;
anya-e0703n0:15382: Te santappiya bhogehi, bhiyyo pucchittha sādaraṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15403: Hāni yākācisatataṃ, yathā tassa na hessati;
anya-e0703n0:15407: Sabbathā na samatthoyaṃ, putto gajabāhu mama.
anya-e0703n0:15410: Nihīno mātugottena, na rajjassa raho mama.
anya-e0703n0:15415: Itipesesi dūte so, ānetuṃ taṃ kumārakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15419: Tassetaṃ vacanaṃ yuttaṃ, vuttaṃ mehita buddhiyā.
anya-e0703n0:15424: Kiñca tattha kumāramhi, nīte vikkama bāhuno;
anya-e0703n0:15430: Iti hatthe gatānaṃ so, dūtānaṃ thanayaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15443: Sutvā dve bhātaro aññe, jeṭṭhasso paratiṃsadā;
anya-e0703n0:15444: Khippaṃ saraṭṭhā āgamma, kāresuṃ antimaṃ vidhiṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15449: Datvā raṭṭhadvayaṃ aññaṃ, vatthuṃ tattheva ādisi;
anya-e0703n0:15453: Dhītaro dve ca gantāna, mahā nāmahulaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15468: Mayhaṃ eso nirālambo, putto hehīti sabbathā.
anya-e0703n0:15470: Tasmā me sunūno esā, dātuṃ yuttā kumārikā;
anya-e0703n0:15485: Tuyhaṃ jātoti amhākaṃ, sambandho so kathaṃ siyā;
anya-e0703n0:15488: Evaṃ so deviyā tāya, nekaso vārayantiyā;
anya-e0703n0:15504: Mūlarajjādhipaccaṃ taṃ, ammaṃ nindākaraṃ na hi.
anya-e0703n0:15510: Pasayha tāva taṃ rajjaṃ, vaṭṭati gaṇhituṃ iti.
anya-e0703n0:15512: Velakkāra balaṃ sabbaṃ, bhindiṃsu dhana dānato;
anya-e0703n0:15516: Ubhinnaṃ rājūnaṃ dūte, pesayuṃ nekaso tato.
anya-e0703n0:15518: Rajjaṃ sādhetvā dassāma, ekībhūtā mayaṃ pana;
anya-e0703n0:15521: Tato dve bhātukā senaṃ, sakaṃ sannayha vegasā;
anya-e0703n0:15524: Pahiṇiṃsu ca te dūte, tato gajabohuvhayo;
anya-e0703n0:15528: Rājāno dve ca no raṭṭhaṃ, saṅgāmatthamupāgatā.
anya-e0703n0:15530: Paṭhamaṃ tesu pakkhassa, ekassa balino bhusaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15531: Mukhabhaṅge kate khippaṃ, tato aññe susādhiyā.
anya-e0703n0:15540: Tatova so nivattitvā, sakaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gato lahuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15551: Raṭṭhe sake sakeyeva, tato pabhūti bhūmipā;
anya-e0703n0:15564: Paccante īdise dese, kathaṃ nāma vasissare.
anya-e0703n0:15590: Janassa balato tassa, passato locanehi so;
anya-e0703n0:15594: Bherini dena pūrento, disā dasa samantato.
anya-e0703n0:15625: Piyena viya mittena, tena saddhiṃ mahīpati.
anya-e0703n0:15636: Gāmaṃ taṃ sādhukaṃ sajju, sajjāpetvā saputtakaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15639: Pitā putto ubho tassa, sambhāsiya piyaṃ vaco;
anya-e0703n0:15673: Puttena saha so saṅkha-tthali nāmaṃ puraṃ gami.
anya-e0703n0:15681: Suṇitvā tañca so amhaṃ, vaṃso jāto mahā”iti;
anya-e0703n0:15694: Khippaṃ kāretukāmo so, sayaṃ iti vicintayi.
anya-e0703n0:15696: Kesa akkhaka gīvaṭṭhi-dāṭhā pattāna meva ca;
anya-e0703n0:15705: Tayo me pitaro bhūpā, mātulopi ca sabbathā;
anya-e0703n0:15714: Tesu kittisiri meghaṃ, petteyyaṃ me ṭhapetva te;
anya-e0703n0:15721: Na heva asmiṃ lokasmiṃ, saṃvijjati kadācipi.
anya-e0703n0:15748: Caritātisayaṃ kattuṃ, samatthā honti ye bhuvi.
anya-e0703n0:15751: Yadihaṃ na karissāmi, moghā me jāti hessati.
anya-e0703n0:15754: Mayā te adhikā kintu, paññādīhīti cintiya.
anya-e0703n0:15760: Yathicchitañce na bhave, mahatī jāni me bhusaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15766: Adhippāyānurūpaṃ me, samatthā vā na vācarā.
anya-e0703n0:15768: Ye keci’dha janā santi, sabbe te mama sammukhā;
anya-e0703n0:15774: Sādhetuṃ dukkaraṃ raṭṭhaṃ, bhavate kākinā kathaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15784: Sabbametaṃ vaco jātu, saddhātabbaṃ siyā na hi.
anya-e0703n0:15809: Taṃ khaṇaṃ purato ko’pi, saṅkhasaddo samuggato.
anya-e0703n0:15811: Tato nekanimittaññū, kumāro taṃ suṇi tva so;
anya-e0703n0:15826: Tahiṃ ṭhite so passitvā, ettakā kinnu āgatā;
anya-e0703n0:15827: Iti pucchi kumārotha, tepi taṃ ida mabravuṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15830: Kimeva muccate maccu-bhayaṃ kesaṃ na vijjati.
anya-e0703n0:15833: Ajjāpi hi mukhe tuyhaṃ, khīragandho pavāyati.
anya-e0703n0:15835: Na hevatthi visuṃ vitta-jātaṃ saṅgahitaṃ tava;
anya-e0703n0:15842: Kāressati idaṃ nāma, sabbathā neva ñāyate.
anya-e0703n0:15853: Nisamma tesaṃ vacanaṃ, vidhāya madhuraṃ sitaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15857: Na jāniṃsu mamaṃ sabbe, yesañhi bhayamidisaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15859: Iti vatvā bhayaṃ tesaṃ, vinodetu mupaṭṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15865: Bāloti maṃ cintaya taṃ, jātā vo kumatīdisī;
anya-e0703n0:15866: Parikkhīyati te jāṇā, navayo’ti na kiṃ sutaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15871: Karissanti yathā vedaṃ, bhayaṃ tumhe jahissatha;
anya-e0703n0:15875: Anudhāvati maṃ tāta, setehi yadi vo bhayaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15877: Purato hotha tumhehi, vatvā te gahitāyudho;
anya-e0703n0:15881: Aparaṃ ravi bimbaṃva, pacchimā sā mukhoditaṃ.
anya-e0703n0:15904: Yathā na sahitā honti, ṭhapetabbā visuṃ visuṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15907: Tathā senāpati katvā, vañcetuṃ taṃ mahāmatiṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15908: Dassetvā’ti thīsakkāraṃ, rañño dūte sa pesayi.
anya-e0703n0:15910: Kumāro’tha viditvāna, tena taṃ vañcanaṃ kataṃ;
anya-e0703n0:15913: Icchitatthassa nipphatti, na me jātu bhavissati;
anya-e0703n0:15920: Māraṇaṃ sāmino mayhaṃ, kiṃ nimittamīti bravi.
anya-e0703n0:15925: Kumārassa mukhaṃ disvā, vedhamāno bhayena so;
anya-e0703n0:15931: Niyogaṃ me vinā tena, kataṃ kammaṃ na yujjati;
